news.headline: Four Days Left Until Blackstone Inc. (NYSE:BX) Trades Ex-Dividend
news.article_text: Readers hoping to buy Blackstone Inc. (NYSE:BX) for its dividend will need to make their move shortly, as the stock is about to trade ex-dividend. Typically, the ex-dividend date is one business day before the record date, which is the date on which a company determines the shareholders eligible to receive a dividend. The ex-dividend date is an important date to be aware of as any purchase of the stock made on or after this date might mean a late settlement that doesn't show on the record date.

news.article_text: Readers hoping to buy Blackstone Inc. (NYSE:BX) for its dividend will need to make their move shortly, as the stock is about to trade ex-dividend. Typically, the ex-dividend date is one business day before the record date, which is the date on which a company determines the shareholders eligible to receive a dividend. The ex-dividend date is an important date to be aware of as any purchase of the stock made on or after this date might mean a late settlement that doesn't show on the record date.

news.headline: Bitcoin crashes below $70,000 on Bitstamp
news.article_text:
Bitcoin's price sell-off continued Thursday, with prices breaking below the widely-tracked $70,000 level on the OG crypto exchange Bitstamp.

BTC's dollar-denominated price slipped to $69,101 during the Asian trading hours, trading a discount to prices on other exchanges, including Coinbase, where BTC hit a low of $70,002.

news.headline: Software Selloff Hits Industry’s Billionaires
news.summary: Having skin in the game has never hurt so much, at least for some of the software industry’s wealthy founders and executives.  This month’s selloff in software has shaved billions of dollars from the value of the shares held by Oracle Chairman Larry Ellison and AppLovin CEO Adam Foroughi.  According to Bloomberg News’s Billionaires Index, software company founders and executives dominate the list of wealthy Americans who have experienced the steepest losses to their net worth this year.
